title: AI-Powered Resume Optimizer
description: A web app that analyzes and optimizes resumes using GPT-based suggestions to improve job matching.

title: Smart Bicycle Lock
description: A Bluetooth-enabled bike lock that can be controlled via smartphone and includes theft detection alerts.

title: Artisan Coffee Subscription Box
description: A subscription service delivering hand-picked, small-batch coffee blends to your door every month.

title: Recycled Plastic Fashion
description: A sustainable clothing line made entirely from ocean-recycled plastics and eco-friendly materials.

title: Digital Mindfulness Coach
description: An AI chatbot that guides users through personalized mindfulness and meditation exercises daily.
